channel.title: Upgrade Lightbeam Blog
channel.description: A project blog for my web development internship with Mozilla

item.title: Remaking Lightbeam as a web extension: what we learned
item.description: Practical takeaways for other web extension developers including a key concept (background versus content scripts), technique (proxy objects) and developer tool (the web-ext CLI).

item.title: Storage: One of the Final Frontiers
item.description: Finding a permanent storage home. Breaking down our move from localStorage via the storage WebExtension API to IndexedDB via Dexie.

item.title: The beginning of the end
item.description: An Unexpected Journey: The Disconnect Entity List, a MozFest Proposal and XSS
